item.description:
We will meet for a buffet brunch in the Speaker's Corner Restaurant at the Crowne Plaza Hotel in Nashua NH. The hotel is just off Amherst Street(101A) near Building 19 and the Kmart plaza. There will be plenty of food including a carving station, omelettes, eggs Benedict, fruit, etc. You shouldn't have to eat for a couple of days after this...
Please bring your ideas and suggestions about what you would like to do, where you want to go and when.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Old Ladies Travel March Meetup
